amendment.description: To clarify the applicability of the Uniform Code of Military Justice during a time of war.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4226 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4226 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6119) To clarify the applicability of the Uniform Code of Military Justice during a time of war.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4226 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4226 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
